verses.verse: Moreover David <S%H1732><s%> and the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> set apart <S%H914><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> certain of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>, and of Heman <S%H1968><s%>, and of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>, who should prophesy <S%H5012><s%> with harps <S%H3658><s%>, with psalteries <S%H5035><s%>, and with cymbals <S%H4700><s%>: and the number <S%H4557><s%> of them that did the work <S%H582><s%> according to their service was <S%H5656><s%>:

of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>: Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>, and Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%>, and Asharelah <S%H841><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>, under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>, who prophesied <S%H5012><s%> after the order <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>.

Of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>; the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>: Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%>, and Zeri <S%H6874><s%>, and Jeshaiah <S%H3470><s%>, Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, and Mattithiah <S%H4993><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%>, under the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%> Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> with the harp <S%H3658><s%>, who prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in giving thanks <S%H3034><s%> and praising <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Of Heman <S%H1968><s%>; the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heman <S%H1968><s%>: Bukkiah <S%H1232><s%>, Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>, Shebuel <S%H7619><s%>, and Jerimoth <S%H3406><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, Hanani <S%H2607><s%>, Eliathah <S%H448><s%>, Giddalti <S%H1437><s%>, and Romamti-ezer <S%H7320><s%>, Joshbekashah <S%H3436><s%>, Mallothi <S%H4413><s%>, Hothir <S%H1956><s%>, Mahazioth <S%H4238><s%>.

All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heman <S%H1968><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s seer <S%H2374><s%> in the words <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, to lift up <S%H7311><s%> the horn <S%H7161><s%>. And God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Heman <S%H1968><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

All these were under the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%> for song <S%H7892><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, with cymbals <S%H4700><s%>, psalteries <S%H5035><s%>, and harps <S%H3658><s%>, for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; Asaph <S%H623><s%>, Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>, and Heman <S%H1968><s%> being under the order <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>.

And the number <S%H4557><s%> of them <S%H251><s%>, with their brethren that were instructed <S%H3925><s%> in singing <S%H7892><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, even all that were skilful <S%H995><s%>, was two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>.

And they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for <S%H5980><s%> their offices <S%H4931><s%>, all alike <S%H6996><s%>, as well the small as the great <S%H1419><s%>, the teacher <S%H995><s%> as the scholar <S%H8527><s%>.

Now the first <S%H7223><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> for Asaph <S%H623><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%>: the second <S%H8145><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%>; he and his brethren <S%H251><s%> and sons <S%H1121><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the third <S%H7992><s%> to Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the fourth <S%H7243><s%> to Izri <S%H3339><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the fifth <S%H2549><s%> to Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the sixth <S%H8345><s%> to Bukkiah <S%H1232><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the seventh <S%H7637><s%> to Jesharelah <S%H3480><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the eighth <S%H8066><s%> to Jeshaiah <S%H3470><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the ninth <S%H8671><s%> to Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the tenth <S%H6224><s%> to Shimei <S%H8096><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> to Azarel <S%H5832><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> to Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%>, Shubael <S%H7619><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the fourteenth <S%H702><s%>, Mattithiah <S%H4993><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> to Jeremoth <S%H3406><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the sixteenth <S%H8337><s%> to Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> to Joshbekashah <S%H3436><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the eighteenth <S%H8083><s%> to Hanani <S%H2607><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the nineteenth <S%H8672><s%> to Mallothi <S%H4413><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Eliathah <S%H448><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the one <S%H259><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Hothir <S%H1956><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the two <S%H8147><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Giddalti <S%H1437><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the three <S%H7969><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Mahazioth <S%H4238><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>:
for the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> to Romamtiezer <S%H7320><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%>.
